name: Purchase register for Tax Audit Report
query:
SELECT
    PI.bill_type AS 'Purchase Type',
    PI.name AS 'Document Code',
    PI.posting_date AS 'Document Date',
    PI.bill_no AS 'Bill No.',
    PI.bill_date AS 'Bill Date',
    PII.expense_account AS 'Name of Expense',
    PII.item_name AS 'Item Name',
    PII.gst_hsn_code AS 'HSN Code',
    PI.supplier AS 'Party Name',
    S.gst_category AS 'GST Category',
    S.gstin AS 'GST No.',
    POI.qty AS 'PO Qty.',
    PII.uom AS 'UOM',
    PII.qty AS 'Invoice Qty.',
    PII.rate AS 'Basic Rate',
    PII.discount_percentage AS 'Disc. Per.',
    PII.discount_amount AS 'Item Wise Disc.',
    PII.amount AS 'Gross Amount',
    PI.additional_discount_percentage AS 'All Disc. Per.',
    PI.discount_amount AS 'Discount Amt.',
    (PII.amount-PII.discount_amount) AS 'Basic Amt.',
    PI.currency AS 'Freight (P)',
    PI.currency AS 'Other Chg.',
    PI.currency AS 'Pack && For Chrgs.',
    PI.rounding_adjustment AS 'R.Off (P-M)',
    PI.rounding_adjustment AS 'R.Off (P-P)',
    PI.grand_total AS 'Net Taxable Amt.',
    (PII.cgst_rate+PII.sgst_rate+PII.igst_rate) AS 'Per. of Tax',
    PII.cgst_amount AS 'CGST (P)',
    PII.sgst_amount AS 'SGST (P)',
    PII.igst_amount AS 'IGST (P)',
    PI.currency AS 'Other Charges w/o GST',
    PI.rounded_total AS 'Total Amount',
    CASE
        WHEN PI.tax_category='Out-State' THEN 'Inter-State'
        WHEN PI.tax_category='In-State' THEN 'Local'
    END AS 'GST Type',
    PII.purchase_order AS 'PO No.',
    PI.owner AS 'Entered By',
    PI.owner AS 'Passed By',
    PI.modified_by AS 'Approved By'
FROM
    `tabPurchase Invoice` AS PI
LEFT JOIN
    `tabPurchase Invoice Item` AS PII ON PI.name = PII.parent
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSupplier` AS S ON S.name = PI.supplier
LEFT JOIN
    `tabPurchase Order` AS PO ON PO.name = PII.purchase_order
LEFT JOIN
    `tabPurchase Order Item` AS POI ON PO.name = POI.parent AND PII.item_code = POI.item_code
ORDER BY
    PI.creation DESC;
report_name: Purchase register for Tax Audit Report
